### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install environment-modules
...

==> Using cached archive: /home/user/devel/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/74/74ccc9ab0fea0064ff3f4c5841435cef13cc6d9869b3c2b25e5ca4efa64a69a1.tar.gz
==> environment-modules: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    './configure' '--prefix=/home/user/devel/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora31-skylake/gcc-9.3.1/environment-modules-4.5.2-4c4w5hh4haydx7hhfdq2ivev7f4qlmbc' '--without-tclx' '--with-tclx-ver=0.0' '--with-tcl=/home/user/devel/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora31-skylake/gcc-9.3.1/tcl-8.6.10-k3hv6crasymrpcelqmbxounnhlbi5a7s/lib' '--with-tcl-ver=8.6' '--disable-dependency-tracking' '--disable-silent-rules' '--disable-versioning' '--datarootdir=/home/user/devel/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora31-skylake/gcc-9.3.1/environment-modules-4.5.2-4c4w5hh4haydx7hhfdq2ivev7f4qlmbc/share' '--with-icase=search' '--enable-extended-default' '--enable-advanced-version-spec' '--enable-color' '--enable-auto-handling' '--with-quarantine-vars=LD_LIBRARY_PATH LD_PRELOAD' '--disable-compat-version' '--with-tclsh=/home/user/devel/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora31-skylake/gcc-9.3.1/tcl-8.6.10-k3hv6crasymrpcelqmbxounnhlbi5a7s/bin/tclsh'

1 error found in build log:
     1    ==> environment-modules: Executing phase: 'install'
     2    ==> [2020-08-31-15:10:41.525647] './configure' '--prefix=/home/user/devel/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora31-skylake/gcc-9.3.1/environment-modules-4.5.2-4c4w5hh4haydx7hhfdq2ivev7f4qlmbc' '--without-tclx' '-
          -with-tclx-ver=0.0' '--with-tcl=/home/user/devel/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora31-skylake/gcc-9.3.1/tcl-8.6.10-k3hv6crasymrpcelqmbxounnhlbi5a7s/lib' '--with-tcl-ver=8.6' '--disable-dependency-tracking' '-
          -disable-silent-rules' '--disable-versioning' '--datarootdir=/home/user/devel/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora31-skylake/gcc-9.3.1/environment-modules-4.5.2-4c4w5hh4haydx7hhfdq2ivev7f4qlmbc/share' '--with-i
          case=search' '--enable-extended-default' '--enable-advanced-version-spec' '--enable-color' '--enable-auto-handling' '--with-quarantine-vars=LD_LIBRARY_PATH LD_PRELOAD' '--disable-compat-version' '--wi
          th-tclsh=/home/user/devel/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora31-skylake/gcc-9.3.1/tcl-8.6.10-k3hv6crasymrpcelqmbxounnhlbi5a7s/bin/tclsh'
  >> 3    ERROR: Unrecognized option `--disable-dependency-tracking'
     4      Try `./configure --help' for more information

```

### Additional information

I will not provide spack build logs, as issue comes from the `environment-modules` package and it has already been reported on Modules project (see cea-hpc/modules#354).

On version 4.5.2 of environment-modules, the `configure` script is a bit too strict and does not accept anymore options like `--disable-dependency-tracking` which are used in spack build recipe.

I will provide a PR to skip these special `configure` options which are not supported on version 4.5.2. But it will only be a special case for this version, as on newer versions of environment-modules all special `configure` options can be set again.

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [ ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: environment-modules 4.5.2
